entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023
